text: The Karnataka State Film Awards 1984–85, presented by Government of Karnataka, to felicitate the best of Kannada Cinema released in the year 1984. == Film Awards == {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Film !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Producer !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Director |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |First Best Film |Accident |Shankar Nag |Shankar Nag |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Second Best Film |Bettada Hoovu |Parvathamma Rajkumar |N. Lakshminarayan |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Third Best Film |Marali Goodige |Gurusharanam Films |K. R.
